Name: Mandarito
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of glass. Add next four ingredients, half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir). Fill glass to brim with more crushed ice and churn some more. TOP with soda, stir and serve with straws.
Review: A vodka Mojito with mandarine accents.
